Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after); ROMAN PERIOD (not before)
Name: Human figurine
Description: Upper section of a female statuette with long hair. The back is crudely fashioned. The necklace and the shoulder straps, as well as a motif following the fringe of her hair, have been painted on. It appears that her hair is held on the forehead by a hairband. Two armbands, depited in relief and highlighted with paint, are present above the biceps.
